inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Score of ≥ 5 on the Ankle Instability Instrument (AII)

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Score of ≤ 90% on the Foot and Ankle Ability Measure (FAAM)- Activity of Daily Living (ADL) Subscale

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: History of ankle sprain with at least two episodes of 'giving way' within the past six months

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: HAM-D score is 20 (no direct relation to AII)

notes: Patient has MDD, but no history of ankle sprain or episodes of 'giving way'.
